page.title: 01Beaconsfield
page.content: Beaconsfield is situated in a very well to do area,and quite well known for its antique shops.One of the oldest buildings in Beaconsfield is an antique shop.The town itself is about 400 years old and on the 10th May every year a fair comes,itÂ£s combined of 4 fairs.ItÂ£s been coming to Beaconsfield for hundreds of years. Beaconsfield still has a Town Crier ,he wears the tradional coat and uses a bell. Beaconsfield is a very convvenient town for comuters to London,because of the popularity of Beaconsfield it boosts the prices of houses up. The market in Beaconsfield started roughly 3 years ago and its still thriving and popular among the public. A lot of poeple travel some distance every Tuesday.It has a friendly atmosphere and locals like it too.
